challenges.title: The Infinite Loop Monster
challenges.description: Oh no! This loop will run forever and crash the program. Find the bug and fix it!

options.text: Add n-- to decrement the counter

challenges.hint: The loop needs to change the value of n each time it runs.

challenges.title: The Null Pointer Nemesis
challenges.description: This code is trying to access a property of an object that might not exist. Fix it to prevent the dreaded null pointer exception!
challenges.hint: Optional chaining (?.) can help with nested properties that might be undefined.

challenges.title: Array Index Attacker
challenges.description: This function is supposed to return the last element of an array, but sometimes it fails. Fix it!
challenges.hint: Array indices are zero-based, so the last element is at length-1.
